div.bibl: Record Books of the Lithuanian Butchers' and Grocers' Association of Bridgeport, In possession of the Secretary, The Lithuanian Butchers' and Grocers' Association, Bridgeport [BUTCHERS' AND GROCERS' ASSOCIATION]

body.p: The Butchers' and Grocers' Association was organized, February 8, 1914.

The purpose of this association is to act in common business interests, to help each other in various incidents, to have friendly festivals and buy a wreath for the members who die. There are thirty-six members.
The organizers were K. Beinorauskes, J. Balciunas, K. Berenkis and K. M. Minetas.
